title: Build Moonlight Rebels streamer website with dual authentication and subscription management

requirements.text: Implement owner/admin authentication system using Internet Identity that restricts access to admin features
acceptanceCriteria: Owner can authenticate using Internet Identity
Admin-specific routes are protected and only accessible to authenticated owner
Clear distinction between owner and regular user authentication flows

requirements.text: Implement separate user authentication system using Internet Identity for regular users

quotes: a seperate login for the user

acceptanceCriteria: Regular users can authenticate using Internet Identity
User authentication is separate from owner authentication
Users can access user-specific features after authentication

requirements.text: Create partner/sponsor/affiliate tracking page that displays and manages partners, sponsors, and affiliates with paid subscription functionality

quotes: another page that tracks partners,sponsors, and afiliates for twitch thats a paid subscription

acceptanceCriteria: Page displays list of partners, sponsors, and affiliates
Each entry can be categorized as partner, sponsor, or affiliate
Subscription-based access control is implemented
Only subscribed users can view the full tracking page or certain details

requirements.text: Integrate Stripe payment processing in the admin page for managing subscriptions

quotes: add stripe login placement in the admin page

acceptanceCriteria: Stripe payment integration is present in admin interface
Admin can manage subscription settings through Stripe
Payment flow is functional for subscription purchases

requirements.text: Design and implement pink and purple Twitch-themed visual design throughout the entire website matching the Moonlight Rebels brand

quotes: make the website name be Moonlight Rebels matches twitch theme pink and purple

acceptanceCriteria: Website uses pink and purple color scheme consistent with Twitch branding
Moonlight Rebels name is prominently displayed
Visual theme is cohesive across all pages
Design reflects gaming/streaming aesthetic

requirements.text: Add bio section that explains the story of a medical mute gamer girl and encourages visitors to follow her

quotes: add a bio that explains why a medical mute gamer girl is nice and you should really follow her

acceptanceCriteria: Bio section is visible on the main page or dedicated about section
Content explains the medical mute gamer girl story in an engaging way
Bio includes call-to-action encouraging visitors to follow
Text is respectful and inspirational

requirements.text: Add button that links to the owner's Twitch channel at https://www.twitch.tv/auroramoonveil

quotes: add a button that links the owners twitch channel https://www.twitch.tv/auroramoonveil

acceptanceCriteria: Button is prominently displayed on the homepage
Button links correctly to https://www.twitch.tv/auroramoonveil
Link opens in a new tab
Button design matches the pink/purple Twitch theme

requirements.text: Store and manage partner, sponsor, and affiliate data in the backend including their details, categories, and subscription requirements
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores partner/sponsor/affiliate records with relevant details
Data model supports categorization (partner vs sponsor vs affiliate)
CRUD operations available for admin to manage entries
Subscription status can be queried to control access

requirements.text: Implement subscription management system in the backend to track user subscription status and control access to premium content
acceptanceCriteria: Backend tracks which users have active subscriptions
Subscription status determines access to partner/sponsor/affiliate tracking
System can verify subscription status before serving protected content
Admin can view and manage subscription states

constraints: Must use Internet Identity for all authentication (both owner and user)
Stripe integration must be frontend-only (no backend Stripe SDK)
All data persistence must use Motoko backend
nonGoals: Third-party social media API integrations beyond linking to Twitch

required: Moonlight Rebels logo with pink and purple gaming aesthetic featuring moon and rebel themes (logo.dim_400x400.png)
Hero background with pink and purple gradient matching Twitch theme and gaming atmosphere (hero-bg.dim_1920x600.png)
